batchCheckRateLimit(address[]).details: Batch check multiple addresses for rate limit status

returns.canRequest: Array of booleans indicating if the user can request funds
returns.timeLeft: Array of uints indicating the time left until the user can request funds

canRequestFunds(address).details: Check if an address can request funds (rate limit check)

returns.canRequest: True if user can request funds
returns.timeLeft: Seconds until next request (0 if can request now)

constructor.details: Constructor sets the contract deployer as owner

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw all funds - owner only

getBalance().details: Get contract balance - public view function

returns._0: Current ETH balance of the contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause the contract in case of emergency Only owner can pause/unpause

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allows owner to withdraw contract funds

params._amount: Amount to withdraw in wei  Security features: - Owner-only access - Reentrancy protection - Balance validation
